item.title: Janae add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: "I especially wish to praise and encourage young mothers. The work of a mother is hard, too often unheralded work... Do the best you can through these years, but whatever else you do, cherish that role that is so uniquely yours and for which heaven itself sends angels to watch over you and your little ones." -- Jeffrey R. Holland

item.title: Janae add a quote by Jeffrey R. Holland
item.description: "If you are lonely, please know you can find <b>comfort</b>. If you are discouraged, please know you can find <b>hope</b>. If you are poor in spirit, please know you can be <b>strengthened</b>. If you feel you are broken, please know you can be <b>mended</b>." -- Jeffrey R. Holland
